title: 'Our thing' Season 4: Episode 7 "I'll Either Die or I'll Lie"
description: The detailed story of The Dibono Hit told by Sammy. Loui Dibono was robbing Sammy, he roughs Louie up to get his money back - and the only way to try and resolve it is through a proper sit down.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
